image_font_size.doc: size of figure fonts in points

select_plot_layer.doc: altitude layer selection for plots showing layer properties

short_cell_ratio.doc: Short I2 cell energy ratio vs time

parameters.type: raw for raw_ratios, scaled for values scaled by locked,unlocked ratios

beam_position.doc: Laser beam position on internal camera (pixels)

interferometer_freq.doc: Frequency change during interval measured by interferometer

tcomp_interf_freq.doc: Temperature compensated frequency deviation during measurement interval

interferometer_spectrum.doc: Power spectrum of interometer fringe pattern

overhead_snapshot.doc: Picture of output window from zenith pointing camera

superseed_controller_temps.doc: Temps reported by super seed laser controller

superseed_controller_voltages.doc: Input control voltage to super seed laser controller

seed_voltage.doc: Input control voltage to seed laser other than superseed

superseed_peltier_power.doc: Power supplied to super seed laser controller Peltier temp cntl

l3_piezo_voltage.doc: Cavity length control voltage for main laser

cal_pulse_time_averaged.doc: Photon counts scattered as laser pulse exits system--time average to rs_mean grid

i2_spectrum.doc: Interferometer frequecies ploted on I2 spectrum

mol_cal_vs_short_cell_ratio.doc: Molecular cal pulse vs short I2 cell transmission

coolant_temperature.doc: Coolant temperature measured at laser input

qswitch_buildup_time.doc: Time between sync pulse and emission of laser pulse

one_wire_temps.doc: System temperatures reported by one-wire sensors

gv_qwp_rotation.doc: Rotation angle of output quarter waveplate--gvhsrl only

optical_bench_air_pressure.doc: Air pressure within hsrl optics enclosure

tcs_temps.doc: Temps reported by thermal control systems

select_tcsoptics_temps.doc: Selected optics box TCS temps--only listed temps

tcs_currents.doc: Currents drawn by thermal control system

ktp_temperature.doc: Temperature of laser frequency doubler crystal

laser_voltage.doc: Voltage drop across laser pump diode

altitude.doc: Lidar MSL altitude vs time--airborne systems only

lat_long.doc: latitude vs longitude vs time--gvhsrl only

seed_percent.doc: Percentage of laser pulses with spectral purity needed for HSRL inversion

pitch_roll_angles.doc: Aircraft pitch and roll angles--gvhsrl only

mode_bits.doc: System operating mode as function of time

dark_counts.doc: Dark counts as function of time
